snippet: The incoming commissioner, William J. Bratton, relied on many of the aggressive techniques that have proved divisive in New York, while navigating complicated racial tensions.
abstract: William J Bratton's tenure as Los Angeles police chief may offer some hints as to what to expect in his renewed role as New York City police commissioner; Mayor-elect Bill de Blasio holds that Bratton's record of using aggressive policing tactics while navigating complicated racial tensions proves that he can police fairly while still bringing down crime.
lead_paragraph: The incoming commissioner, William J. Bratton, relied on many of the aggressive techniques that have proved divisive in New York, while navigating complicated racial tensions.

headline.main: Bratton’s Time in California May Offer Clues to His Plans for New York Police
headline.print_headline: Bratton’s Time in California May Offer Clues to His Plans for the City’s Police
